short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This secure wallet interacts with CrossFi and EVM blockchains, enabling seamless transaction of native coins across various network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a secure wallet designed to interact with CrossFi and various EVM-compatible blockchains, allowing users to send and receive native coins seamlessly.
